product.name: Toothbrush
product.brief_description: Oral-B Genius 9900 Set of 2 Electric Toothbrushes Rechargeable, 2 Handles Rose Gold and Black, 6 Modes, Pressure Sensor, 4 Toothbrush Heads, Travel Case, 2 Pin UK Plug, Gift for Men/Women
product.p1: Available at a lower price from other sellers that may not offer free Prime delivery.
product.p2: Note: This item is eligible for FREE Click and Collect without a minimum order subject to availability.
product.p3: From the No.1 dentists recommended brand worldwide
product.p4: Removes up to 100 Percent more plaque vs a manual toothbrush for cleaner teeth and healthier gums
product.p5: 100 Percent brushing coverage: With position detection technology so you never miss a zone
product.p6: With gum pressure sensor: Alerts you when you are brushing too hard to protect your gums
product.p7: Choose from six brushing modes including deep clean, sensitive, whitening
product.p8: Two weeks battery life from one charge
product.p9: Includes: One Rose gold and one midnight black handles, four brush heads, lithium ion battery and travel case
product.p10: With Oral-Bâ€™s thirty-day money back guarantee and two year warranty as standard
